description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Space Rage is a retro 2D shooter with enhanced graphics for 1080p HD.  Featuring multi-core particle effects engine and 50 levels of space age destruction.
description.short: Space Rage is a retro 2D shooter with enhanced graphics for 1080p HD.  Featuring multi-core particle effects engine and 50 levels of space age destruction.
